info.description:
The Product API will enable our hotels partners to create and edit their room types and rate plans via APIs, without having to use EPC or contact their market manager. The API also enables our partners to read the definition of the room types and rate plans created in the system.

Use your existing EQC credentials or the following test credentials: EQCtest12933873 / cc47an46
info.title: Product API

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status filter. String. Only supported value is "all".

get.summary: Obtain a list of room types for a given property

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status filter. Only supported value is "all".

parameters.name: roomTypeDTO
parameters.description: JSON message describing the new room type

get.summary: Read a single room type from a given property

parameters.name: roomTypeDTO
parameters.description: JSON message with modified room type

get.summary: Read a single room type's amenities

put.summary: Set room type amenities to an existing room type

parameters.name: roomTypeAmenityDTOs
parameters.description: JSON message with the room type amenities

get.summary: Obtain a list of rate plans

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status filter. String. Only supported value is "all".

parameters.name: ratePlanDTO
parameters.description: JSON message describing the new rate plan

parameters.name: ratePlan
parameters.description: JSON message of modified rate plan

compensation.description: Applicable compensation rules for this distribution model. Defaults to the value defined on the contract with the partner

distributionModel.description: Distribution model adopted by the rate plan, matching property configuration. ExpediaCollect: indicates that when customers book this rate plan, they will pay Expedia. HotelCollect: indicates that when customers book this rate plan, they will pay the property. Note: if a product can be sold as both ExpediaCollect and HotelCollect, there will be 2 distribution rules under the rate plan to indicate this

expediaId.description: String, min 1, max 50 characters. Expedia rate plan ID that will be specified in booking messages and that should be used to manage avail/rates if this set of distribution rules is marked as manageable.

manageable.description: Cannot be provided in a create request. Default to yes for HotelCollect-only or ExpediaCollect-only rate plans. For ExpediaTravelerPreference rate plans, if rate acquisition type is net, ExpediaCollect will default to true; if rate acquisition type is Sell/LAR, HotelCollect will default to true.

partnerCode.description: Unique partner identifier for the rate plan. For a given room type, this code has to be unique per distribution model (e.g. for all ExpediaCollect rate plan distribution rules under this room, this code has to be unique). Uniqueness will be validated by Expedia during create or update operations.

city.description: City in which the property is located

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 Alpha 3 country code, for the country where the property is located

line2.description: Second line of address, not always available

postalCode.description: Postal or State Code, might not be available

state.description: State/Province, which is optional and thus might not be available

ageCategories.description: Defines the different age categories supported by the room type. At the very least, the 'Adult' category must be defined.

extraBedding.description: Defines the configuration (type, size and quality) of any extra beds the room type may have.

maxOccupancy.description: Defines the maximum occupancy for the room, counting adults and children.

name.description: Formed by a [ISO 639-1]-[ISO-3166-1]. If applicable, it contains the RNS attributes used to generate the value. Max 255 characters

partnerCode.description: Partner room type code/identifier. Max. 40 characters

resourceId.description: Expedia ID for this resource. Generated when created. Generated on POST, required on PUT

roomSize.description: Used to define room size. When used, both size in square feet and in square meters must be specified.

smokingPreferences.description: Used to define whether the room type is smoking, nonsmoking, or if both options are available on request. If a single smoking option is provided, then the room is, by default, only available in this configuration. If both options are provided, then a choice will be offered to the customer at the time he makes a reservation, and the customer preference will be sent in electronic booking messages to the partner

standardBedding.description: Lists the different combination of beds (type, size and quality) a room may have.

status.description: Room type status is derived from the rate plans under the room type: if at least 1 rate plan is active, the room type status will be active. If all rate plans are inactive, then the room type becomes inactive as well.

views.description: Used to indicate the views available from this room.

wheelchairAccessibility.description: Used to indicate whether the room is configured to be wheelchair accessible or not.

endDate.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Cancel penalty exception's end date

penalties.description: Definition of the exception penalties applied

startDate.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Cancel penalty exception's starting date

ageCategory.description: The age category for the additional guests

amount.description: Min value 0.000, accepts up to 3 decimal points

dateEnd.description: Date at which this amount will not be effective anymore. If no end date defined, will be returned as 2079-06-06.

dateStart.description: Date at which this amount started being applicable, can be in the past

exceptions.description: Depending on the contractual agreement between Expedia and the partner, compensation can vary based on different criteria. This array of exceptions will reflect this

minAmount.description: Minimum amount. Accepts up to 3 decimal points. Only applicable to ExpediaCollect distribution rules

percent.description: Compensation percentage applied by default. Expressed as a value. Between 0 and 1, accepts up to 4 decimal points

detailCode.description: Adds precision or qualifies the amenity. Mandatory for some amenity, optional for other and prohibited by the rest of the amenities.

value.description: Integer. Adds precision to the amenity. Mandatory for some amenity, optional for other and prohibited by the rest of the amenities.

accessibility.description: Attribute that determines if room is considered wheelchair accessible

area.description: Attributed used to highlight the location of the room

bedroomDetails.description: Attribute that describes details of the bedroom used to compose the name of the room

customLabel.description: Free text that can be appended to the name generated by the attributes. Use of this attribute is discouraged (see full spec). Max 37 characters

featuredAmenity.description: Attribute used to highlight a feature of the room on its name

includeBedType.description: Attribute that determines whether or not to include bed type on the room name

includeSmokingPref.description: Attribute that determines if room has smoking preference

roomClass.description: Attribute that described the class of room, which is used to compose the name

typeOfRoom.description: Attribute that determines the type of room, which is used to compose the name

view.description: Attribute that gives additional information about the view of the room

amount.description: Min value 0.000 (3 decimal points). The amount provided here should be based on the property rate acquisition type. If the property rate acquisition type is Net, the rate provided here should be net of Expedia compensation. If it is SellLAR, the rate should be what the customer will be charged (inclusive of Expedia compensation). Used to define a flat amount that would be charged as a cancel or change penalty. This would normally replace a per-stay fee, but it can also be added on top of a per-stay fee if that is what the partner requires

deadline.description: Number of hours prior to the arrival of the guest. When set to 0, it means up until end of the day of arrival. Min 0, Max 999

perStayFee.description: Fee that will be charged if the customer cancels within the specified deadline.

additionalGuestAmounts.description: Array of additional guest amounts. Up to 6 can be specified, 1 per category. Only 1 amount can be given per category, for all dates

bookDateEnd.description: Date at which this rate plan stops being available for searching on any Expedia POS. Format YYYY-MM-DD. If not restricted, will be returned as 2079-06-06. If in 2079, indicates this rate plan book end date is unrestricted

bookDateStart.description: Date at which this rate plan starts being available for searching on any Expedia POS. If in the past, indicates rate plan book date start is not restricted. Accepted format: YYYY-MM-DD. If not restricted, will be returned as 1900-01-01

cancelPolicy.description: Default cancel policy. If not provided in a create request, the product API will select a refundable cancellation policy that is currently used by the most recently created standalone rate plan under the same property

distributionRules.description: Used to provide information about how this rate plan can be sold (ExpediaCollect, HotelCollect or both).

maxAdvBookDays.description: The maximum days before a stay date that the rate plan can be sold. Min 1, Max 500

maxLOSDefault.description: Default maximum LengthOfStay restriction. Min 1, Max 28. Set to 28 by default if not provided in a create request. Will always be considered along the value defined for each stay date, and the most restrictive of this default and the daily restriction will prevail

minAdvBookDays.description: The minimum days before a stay date that the rate plan can be sold. Min 1, Max 500

minLOSDefault.description: Default minimum LengthOfStay restriction. Min 1, Max 28. Set to 1 by default if not provided in a create request. Will always be considered along the value defined for each stay date, and the most restrictive of this default and the daily restriction will prevail

mobileOnly.description: Indicates this rate plan is only available through shopping done on mobile devices

name.description: Name of the rate plan, for information/identification purposes. Min 1, Max 40 characters. If not provided, defaults to the manageable rate plan partner code.

occupantsForBaseRate.description: Max occupants allowed for the base rate. Min 1, Max 20. This is only applicable for per day pricing properties, and required in create requests. It indicates how many occupants the per day price applies to

pricingModel.description: Rate Plan pricing model. Will default to property’s pricing model, and if provided, it has to match the property’s pricing model

rateAcquisitionType.description: Rate acquisition type, inherited from the Property

resourceId.description: Expedia ID for this resource. Generated when created. Generated on POST, required on PUT

status.description: Defaults to active if not provided during creation

taxInclusive.description: Returned to indicate whether the rate being exchanged over other APIs (availability/rates or booking) is inclusive of taxes or not. During creation, for properties managing net rates, the default value is false. For sell rates, it is based on the property's configuration

travelDateEnd.description: Latest date at which customers can checkout for a stay including this rate plan. Format YYYY-MM-DD. If not restricted, will be returned as 2079-06-06. If in 2079, indicates rate plan travel end date is not restricted

travelDateStart.description: Date at which customers can start checking in for a stay including this rate plan. Format YYYY-MM-DD. If not restricted, will be returned at 1900-01-01.If in the past, indicates rate plan travel start date is not restricted

type.description: Rate Plan type. Only Standalone type can be managed through the Product API. Defaults to Standalone if not provided during creation

valueAddInclusions.description: Array of value add inclusions. Value add inclusions are special features included with this rate. Breakfast, Internet, or parking inclusions are the most frequently used ones

category.description: The age category whose occupancy is being defined

minAge.description: Minimum age allowed for the category. Min 0, max 99

dateEnd.description: End date of the exception rule. Accepted format: YYYY-MM-DD

dateStart.description: Starting date of the exception rule. Accepted format: YYYY-MM-DD

fri.description: For any exception, all 7 days of week are returned with a true/false indicator.

mon.description: For any exception, all 7 days of week are returned with a true/false indicator.

percent.description: Between 0 and 1, accepts up to 3 decimal points

sat.description: For any exception, all 7 days of week are returned with a true/false indicator.

sun.description: For any exception, all 7 days of week are returned with a true/false indicator.

thu.description: For any exception, all 7 days of week are returned with a true/false indicator.

tue.description: For any exception, all 7 days of week are returned with a true/false indicator.

wed.description: For any exception, all 7 days of week are returned with a true/false indicator.

day.description: Can be of same day or next day. Complements the time attribute

time.description: Indicates at which time we’ll stop making inventory available for same day reservations

attributes.description: Defines the attributes used to compose the common name for the room. You should not provide a custom name when using these attributes

value.description: The custom name provided for the room. Max. 255 characters. Not to be used in conjunction with the attributes

defaultPenalties.description: Default penalties' definition. Min 1, Max 2 penalties defined

exceptions.description: List os exceptional cancel penalties defined for the Rate Plan

baseAllocationEnabled.description: Boolean to indicate whether this property has a base allocation contract with Expedia.

cancellationTime.description: Cancellation deadline reference time. When cancel policies are defined and exchanged via the rate plan resource, a deadline in hours is provided. The deadline in hours is always relative to this property cancellation deadline reference time configuration

currency.description: Format: ISO 4217 Alpha 3. This currency code is applicable to all amounts found in any resources available as part of the EPS Product API.

distributionModels.description: Distribution model(s) under which the property is configured to work with Expedia

minLOSThreshold.description: This property configuration is used by Expedia when MinLOS Restrictions updates are received via EQC AR. If the MinLOS restriction update attempted via EQC AR is greater than this value, the update will be rejected.

name.description: Name describing the property. Max. 255 characters

partnerCode.description: Partner property code/identifier. Max 64 characters. Optional field returned for connected properties. This code allows partner to uniquely identify the property in its system.

pricingModel.description: Configuration of the property when it comes to pricing rooms and rates.

rateAcquisitionType.description: Describes which type of rate will be provided via this API, but also which type of rate should be used when managing availability and rates in  ExpediaPartnerCentral or using EC or EQC APIs.

reservationCutOff.description: Used to indicate when we stop making rate plans available to book for same day reservations.

resourceId.description: Expedia ID for this resource. Generated when created. Generated on POST, required on PUT

status.description: Status in which the property can be in; Allowed values are: Active, Inactive, Onboarding, UnderConversion

taxInclusive.description: Returned to indicate whether the rate being exchanged over other APIs (availability/rates or booking) is inclusive of taxes or not.

timezone.description: Descriptive information about property timezone configuration in Expedia system. Description will start by a GMT offset, followed by a friendly name.

squareFeet.description: Room size in square feet. No decimals.

squareMeters.description: Room size in square meters. No decimals.
